name: admonishingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is intended to tell someone that they have done something wrong: She raised her finger admonishingly and I stopped talking immediately. He looked admonishingly at the boys over his glasses.
More examplesFewer examplesShe would frown at me admonishingly every time I made the slightest mistake in pronunciation.They pointed admonishingly at his camera and yelled at him to stop filming.The professor waved the single piece of paper under my nose admonishingly and said, "Do you call this an essay?"
